We ought to have more precisely labeled our enemies as violent Islamists, he writes in the final chapter. The son of a schoolteacher, Donald Rumsfeld has long been a stickler for precise language. Laurence Lovejoy stabbed, beat, poisoned and drowned Waubonsie Valley High School sophomore Erin Justice in Aurora. Justice's mother found the 16-year-old's body in a bathtub of their townhome in March, 2004. He left her to drown in a pool of her own blood, DuPage County Assistant State's Attorney Michael Vick Pawl said during closing arguments Tuesday. Lovejoy, 44, formerly of Naperville, was sentenced to death in 2006, but the appellate court overturned the case amid confusion
